entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
